column1: The 1st Respondent-Respondent (“1st Respondent”) issued a quit notice  dated 19.10.2011
(“Quit Notice of 19.10.2011”) to the Petitioner-Respondent (“Respondent”) in terms of
Section  3  of  the  State  Lands  (Recovery  of  Possession)  Act  No.  7  of  1979  as  amended
The  Quit  Notice  of  19.10.2011  referred  to  Scrub  Estate  (ස්ක්‍රබ්වත්ත).  The  metes  and
bounds of the land identified in the Quit Notice of 19.10.2011 are as follows:
